alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Several strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Brunswick and southeastern Columbus Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 135 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of developing strong thunderstorms producing very heavy rain and frequent lightning from north of Boiling Spring Lakes to the southwest of Freeland, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds. Locations impacted include... Boiling Spring Lakes, Bishop, Makatoka, Freeland, Honey Island, Supply, Exum, Longwood, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Mill Creek, Town Creek, Ash, Winnabow, Bolivia and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
